Overwhelming Smash

Triple damage.

Nicked an Artery

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target takes @Damage[2d6[bleed]].

Care your Initials

Normal damage. The target is so humiliated it can do nothing but attack you. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a @Check[will] to end this effect.

Distraction

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the end of its next turn.
